author: smillatt
title: Fantastic, hours of fun
review:
This has been my first purchase since re-emerging from my dark age and reigniting my love for Lego, 15 years on from being a kid.

This set is large, with 965 pieces, various models and hours of fun. My highlights are the sliding prison gates for the inmates, the dog's pen and bowl, the sliding garage doors for the nice police vans and lots of other little idiosyncrasies.

Real value for money, I got it brand new for Â£50 off eBay.

Plenty of spare parts, in-depth instructions and looks great in any budding Lego City.

Here is a photo of the main body of the set, which I've just constructed today.

http://www.flickr.com/photos/91736360@N05/8342132229/

Note the 2 incandescent inmates stuck in their cells!

Enjoy!
